descriptor.name: Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana (PMJDY) Assignment
descriptor.short_desc: Assignment: Guide a citizen through PMJDY account opening and document the process and learnings.
descriptor.long_desc:
Assignment Overview:
This assignment requires you to apply your knowledge of the Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana (PMJDY) by simulating or assisting a citizen in opening a PMJDY account. Document each step, from eligibility check to account activation and benefit awareness.

  1. Task:
    Guide a real or hypothetical beneficiary through the PMJDY account opening process, ensuring all requirements are met.
  2. Documentation:
    Record the steps, challenges, and solutions. Include forms or screenshots if possible.
  3. Reflection:
    Write a brief reflection on the importance of financial inclusion and what you learned from this assignment.

Why Complete This Assignment:

  • Reinforce your practical knowledge of PMJDY procedures.
  • Develop the ability to assist others in accessing banking services.
  • Prepare for real-world scenarios as a financial advisor or community facilitator.

descriptor.name: Haqdarshak
descriptor.short_desc: A social enterprise connecting citizens with their eligible government welfare schemes.
descriptor.long_desc: Haqdarshak is a tech platform that bridges the information and access gap between citizens and social protection services. We use an assisted-tech model with trained agents to provide last-mile support for discovering and applying for government and private welfare schemes.
